item.title: Mike add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Mike add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Donâ€™t go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mike add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Mike add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mike add a quote by James Clavell
item.description: "Leave the problems of God to God and karma to karma. Today you're here and nothing you do will change that. Today you are alive and here and honored and blessed with good fortune. Look at this suset, it's beautiful, neh? This sunset exists. Tomorrow does not exist. There is only now. Please look. It is so beautiful and it will never happen ever again, never, not this sunset, never in all infinity. Lose yourself in it, make yourself one with nature and do not worry about karma, yours, mine, or that of the village." -- James Clavell

item.title: Mike add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "What I say is, a town isn't a town without a bookstore. It may call itself a town, but unless it's got a bookstore it knows it's not fooling a soul." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Mike add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Mike add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "No one who can read, ever looks at a book, even unopened on a shelf, like one who cannot." -- Charles Dickens
